name: Avoid embedded metadata in class where a stylesheet may be cleaner (Flex)
description: This QR reports flex classes which use embedded metadata where CSS would be cleaner approach.
output:
This QR reports flex classes which use embedded metadata where CSS would be cleaner approach. It provides following information:

- Flex class full name
rationale: It is cleaner to have CSS than to embed metadata in source.
remediation: Use css instead of embedding metadata in source.
